title: Foxworth Friday: Big Spending, NFL Divisional Round
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth discuss etiquette when talking about spending big on a particular item (1:15) prior to sharing their analysis of Chiefs-Bills (22:17), 49ers-Packers (28:16) and Rams-Buccaneers (38:12) in the Divisional Round of the NFL Playoffs. Plus, somewhere along the way they get into the types of situations a young QB can succeed in, touching on everyone from Panthers QB Cam Newton to Bengals QB Joe Burrow (8:28).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
